verbose_text: Fluorescence activated cell sorting (FACS) analysis of Annexin V and cleaved caspase-3 and real-time RT-PCR analysis of expression of the apoptotic and anti-apoptotic genes Bax and Bcl-xl showed no significant difference between control and Tfam deficient Tregs (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY - XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), consistent with a previous report showing that Tfam deficiency has no significant effect on CD4 + T cell survival.
evidence: expression of the apoptotic and anti-apoptotic genes Bax
